scripts.update-controller: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name UserDatabaseController -async -api -outDir Controllers -dc webapi.MyDbContext.MyUserContext -m webapi.MyDbContext.MyUser -f
scripts.update-page: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator razorpage UserDatabaseView List -outDir Pages -dc webapi.MyDbContext.MyUserContext -m webapi.MyDbContext.MyUser -f
